manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: 30FPS Full HD Webcam with Microphone Are you looking for a durable and high-level USB Webcam for your computer? Do you need the pc camera for everyday professional work? QEBIDUM Computer Web Camera With Mic can help you to have a perfect professional call with its high-clearly video and sound. Camera for the computer is perfect for an online class, video calling, conferencing, live streaming, gaming, recording.

MORE KEY FEATURES 360° Degree Flexible Rotation The QEBIDUM computer camera can be adjustable left & right 360 degrees and up & down 180 degrees by the bracket. It can be also stably placed on the desktop and clamped on the display (It will not damage the screen). With exquisite appearance, you can adjust the angle as you like with no worry. 1080p Webcam with Microphone Built-in stereo microphone offers a super clear communication during video time, available to capture audio within 20 feet with no problem. With the echo and noise cancelling chips, this pc camera decreases 30-40% noise than the normal web cameras on the market, which is feeling like you are talking to someone face to face. Plug and Play USB 2.0 connector, no need to download or install complicated driver software. Just plug, easily connected. With a rotatable clip, you can mount the usb web camera on any device, such us laptop, tripod, desktop, computers, LCD monitor and even just put laptop webcam on a desk.

Surprising Uses for QEBIDUM 1080p webcam! 1080P Full HD Webcam: Computer camera with Full HD glass lens deliver crisp image and crystal clear video at a fluid 30 fps. 120 Degree Computer Webcam: Fixed focus Webcam captures HD video at a wide angle up to 120 degrees, Perfect for live streaming, video calling, recording, and conferencing, etc. Wide Compatibility: PC webcam Work with Windows 7/8/10, Mac OS, Linux, Chrome OS, XBOX and Android systems; Suitable for Skype, YouTube, and other mainstream software & App.

External Webcam Technical Specifications: Image Sensor CMOS Display Resolution 2.0MP, 1920*1080P Lens HD 2 million lens Resolution 1920*1080 Maximal Frame Rate 30 frames / sec Audio Built-in stereo microphone Power supply PC-USB interface power supply USB interface USB2.0 interface, 1.5M cable. Plug and play Operating systems for Windows XP, Vista, 7, 8, 10, and other operating systems
